::Blacknightmare::

"Remember that some warriors of this war are half biological and half 
robot "Said Blacknighmare "Exact imitation I could said" replied 
kindly Blacknighmare "My smell-circuist can't said the diference, but 
Perceptor could say the last word and Darkfate's smell circuits are 
sharp too"

"You'll need a name, all need it" replied kindly the reaven


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  He said in an artifical voice. "I have no name. I am a gift from 
nature. I 
> have no name. I am not one warrior but many. The more bot i meet 
the more 
> bots i become. I am not an individual but a group. Just by seeing 
you i can 
> do this." he transformed into the raven. "Check your scanners i 
have the 
> exact signature of you. And no machine could tell the difference."
